thread.title: Bride gets massively upstaged on her wedding day - the internet has lots of fun with the photo - Irish Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Bride gets massively upstaged on her wedding day - the internet has lots of fun with the photo - Irish Mirror Online

author: Zahra Mulroy
title: Bride gets massively upstaged on her wedding day - the internet has lots of fun with the photo - Irish Mirror Online
text:
Beluga whales are known for being playful (Photo: Barcroft) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
There's a real art to getting a wedding photo which will stand the test of time. 
After all, fashions come and go and love doesn't always last forever. 
One couple, however, have inadvertently nailed it - and it's all because of a beluga whale. 
During a a wedding ceremony at Mystic Seaport in Mystic, Connecticut, the whale upstaged both bride and groom when it sensed a photo opportunity too good to miss, and people can't get enough of it. 
We like to think this was the bit where the officiant says, "If anyone knows of any lawful impediment..." 
In itself, the photo is already pretty amazing. But the fun doesn't stop there. 
Several clever people decided it was an opportunity too good to miss, and the happy couple's wedding photo become the subject of an amazing Reddit photo-shop battle . So here's a plot twist. Every picture tells a story. Whales don't understand dress codes. The whale gets a happy ending. Good turn out.
